text: In this video,
I'm going to explain to you
how to play Wraith in Apex Legends.
With these tips,

you will be put in the
best position possible
to win with her and become Apex champion.
Wraith has three abilities:

a passive ability called
Voices from the Void

that will audibly warn you
when danger approaches;
a tactical ability called Into the Void,
which lets you reposition quickly
through the safety of void space,
avoiding all damage;

and an ultimate ability
called Dimensional Rift

that links two locations
with portals for 60 seconds,
allowing anyone to use them.
Wraith's abilities are incredible

for positioning and
fighting if used properly.

With her smaller hit box
and quicker movement,
she can be difficult for enemies to hit
and great for landing early shots

and giving your team the
early fight advantage.

Her passive ability will
automatically activate
when you're spotted.

It's nice for keeping
you aware of enemy teams

in your proximity that have
a line of sight on you.
When this happens,
you can let your teammates know

and communicate where
to safely reposition to.
Her tactical ability is best used

when repositioning around an
enemy for a potential flank

or to escape a sticky situation
where you might go down.

Just be sure to find cover
before activating this ability,

since it does take 1.25
seconds to trigger.
If you don't, you'll be a sitting duck
and an easy target for the enemy.
Her ultimate ability is multifaceted.
You can use it to enter a fight
in order to get teammates
in and out of the battle quicker.
On the other hand,

the portal can give you an
easy withdrawal if needed.

You can use it to pull downed
teammates out of combat

so they can be revived
and you all can regroup
to reassess the situation.
